= Introduction =

The GEStatusStrip control intergrates with the GEWebBrowser to provide useful data such as the api, plugin and browser versions as well as data streaming information.


= Details =

The GEToolStrip inherits from the standard [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.windows.forms.statusstrip.aspx System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip] control class

== Constructor == 

_ GEStatusStrip_ *GEStatusStrip()*<br>
Initializes a new instance of the GEStatusStrip class

== Public Properties ==

_Bool_ *ShowStreamingProgressBar*<br>
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the streaming progress bar is visible <br>

_Bool_ *ShowStreamingStatusLabel*<br>
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the streaming status label is visible <br>

_Bool_ *ShowBrowserVersionStatusLabel*<br>
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the browser version label is visible <br>

_Bool_ *ShowApiVersionStatusLabel*<br>
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the api version label is visible <br>

_Bool_ *ShowPluginVersionStatusLabel*<br>
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the plug-in version label is visible <br>

_Int_ *Interval*<br>
Gets or sets the timer interval for polling data in milliseconds <br>

== Public methods ==

_void_ *SetBrowserInstance(FC.GEPluginCtrls.GEWebBrowser browser)*<br>
Set the browser instance for the control to work with<br>
*Parameters*<br>
browser: The GEWebBrowser instance to associate with the control<br>
